FuncDef:
The description command configures description for a certificate access policy.
The undo description command deletes the description of a certificate access policy. The description command configures description for a certificate access policy. The undo description command deletes the description of a certificate access policy. By default, a certificate access policy does not have a description.

ParaDef.Info:
The description is configured for the certificate access policy.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 case-sensitive characters without question marks (?).
